briefTitle: Evaluation of the Immunogenicity and Safety of GlaxoSmithKline (GSK) Biologicals' Quadrivalent Influenza Vaccine Influsplit™ Tetra (Fluarix™ Tetra) (GSK2321138A) When Co-administered With Pneumovax™ 23 in Adults 50 Years of Age and Older
officialTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Quadrivalent Split Virion Influenza Vaccine 2014/2015 Influsplit™ Tetra (Fluarix™ Tetra) (GSK2321138A) When Co-administered With Pneumovax™ 23 in Adults 50 Years of Age and Older
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the immunogenicity and safety when GSK Biologicals' influenza vaccine Influsplit™ Tetra (Fluarix™ Tetra) is co-administered with Merck \& Co. Inc.'s pneumococcal vaccine (Pneumovax™23/Pneumovax) in adults 50 years of age and older at risk for complications from influenza and pneumococcal infections.

primaryOutcome.measure: Humoral Immune Response in Terms of Haemagglutination Inhibition (HI) Antibodies Titers Against the 4 Vaccine Strains.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: At Day 28 post Influsplit™ Tetra vaccination
